sentences.en: All shades of mauve, lilac, lavender and purple were fashionable.
sentences.cn: 所有紫红色、淡紫粉色、淡紫色和紫色都很流行。

sentences.en: It is surrounded by fields, rape, or wheat, or vines in the Palatinate, lavender in Provence.
sentences.cn: 它被田野包围着，周围是油菜、小麦、葡萄园、普法尔茨的藤蔓，以及普罗旺斯的薰衣草。

sentences.en: Studies have found that lemon and lavender scents can produce the most positive, calming results.
sentences.cn: 研究发现柠檬和薰衣草的气味能够产生最积极、平静的效果。
